header_19.raw_response: Diet Coke falls somewhere in the middle of the zesty-bland spectrum. While it has a distinctive taste due to its artificial sweeteners and carbonation, it doesn't have the robust, complex flavors of some other sodas. Its taste is more straightforward and less intense compared to, say, a cola with caramel notes. However, it is far from being bland as it has a noticeable and recognizable flavor. Given these factors, I would place Diet Coke around the 30 mark, indicating a moderate level of zesty flavor.
